data.title: Similar companies to Hyperline
data.meta_description: Companies like Hyperline. Similar companies and competitors including the VentureRadar Innovation and Growth scores, Company Information, Location and more.
data.text:
Zenskar

Privately Held

Founded date unknown

USA

Zenskar offers an intuitive, low-code billing automation platform designed for SaaS companies, enabling them to handle complex billing scenarios. The platform supports flexible pricing models, including subscriptions and usage-based billing, with a no-code drag-and-drop contract builder. It automates billing, receivables management, usage monitoring, revenue recognition, and provides real-time analytics. Zenskar also simplifies compliance with accounting standards, offers enterprise-grade security, and integrates seamlessly with existing tools. The platform is designed to increase operational efficiency and optimize cash flows with customizable invoicing and automated follow-ups.

https://www.zenskar.com

Tipalti

Privately Held

Founded 2010

USA

Tipalti is the only payables automation solution to streamline all phases of the global accounts payable workflow in one holistic cloud platform. Tipalti makes it painless for finance departments to manage their entire AP and supplier payments operation. Leading companies use Tipalti to eliminate up to 80% of their supplier payments workload, helping them scale their business efficiently with global growth, while strengthening financial and tax compliance controls. Hundreds of companies trust Tipalti to transform their supplier payment operations including Roku, Zumba, Twitter, GoDaddy, Zola, Twitch, GoPro, Foursquare, and Vimeo.

http://www.tipalti.com

TRY OUR SIMILAR COMPANIES APP

Find B2B Sales Prospects

Research Competitive Landscapes

Export Lists

Open Now

Lago

Privately Held

Founded 2021

France

Lago is an open-source metering and usage-based billing solution. It offers a plug-and-play system that connects to data sources, handling pre-aggregation and cleaning for billing purposes. The product includes a first-class API for engineers and a user-friendly interface for business teams, covering aspects like subscription, usage computations, billing cycles, dates, currencies etc. Lago provides two hosting options - cloud or self-hosted - both offering the same benefits of their powerful API and intuitive interface. They offer solutions suitable for small projects as well as premium services designed for larger teams seeking control and flexibility.

https://www.getlago.com/

Opencell Software

Privately Held

Founded date unknown

France

Opencell provide an end-to-end solution for monetizing next generation digital services in real time regardless of type of service, customer or business model. With its unique modular design built around a powerful convergent billing engine, Opencell provides self care, customer care, mediation, rating, charging, invoicing, payment and receivables management as well as finance and business intelligence on an integrated platform. Opencell enables digital service providers to quickly launch new services, to monetize new revenue streams and deliver improved customer experiences.

https://opencellsoft.com/

Togai

Privately Held

Founded date unknown

USA

Togai is a metering and pricing platform for B2B companies. Its solution enables businesses to implement any pricing change without engineering effort. With integration into existing monetization and quote-to-cash tools (CPQ, CRM, Billing, Usage analytics, Revenue recognition), the company can help companies communicate, implement and analyze pricing changes effectively without manual effort.

https://www.togai.com

Orb

Privately Held

Founded 2021

USA

Orb is a modern pricing platform purpose-built for flexible pricing models. Orb spans the end-to-end revenue workflow, from robust metering capabilities to flexible pricing and packaging iteration, streamlined invoicing, and reporting and revenue recognition. The company’s product supports the end-to-end workflow for revenue, helping teams across Product, Eng, Finance, and RevOps achieve their goals faster. High-growth B2B technology companies use Orb to automate billing and enable pricing experimentation. Orb enables them to focus on their core business, not on billing. Orb is on a mission to provide every business with the infrastructure to unlock its revenue.

https://www.withorb.com

Curacubby

Privately Held

Founded 2016

USA

Developer of a SaaS based payment software designed to help pre-schools efficiently manage tuition collection and invoicing. The company’s SaaS based payment software creates invoices and automate billing schedule from anywhere on any device, connects schools and parents to make mobile payments easy, seamless and affordable, enabling parents to their child’s tuition from anywhere, easily and securely.

http://www.curacubby.com

Kintsugi, Inc.

Privately Held

Founded 2022

USA

Kintsugi AI is a technology company that provides a tax automation platform. Their end-to-end sales tax management solution offers an array of services including real time nexus monitoring, AI-enabled product categorization, rooftop-level tax calculation and validation, sales tax registration, filing, exemption certificates handling, and back-tax compliance. The platform is secure, encrypted, GDPR-compliant, and SOC 2 Type II compliant, adhering to advanced protocols for Security, Availability, Processing Integrity, Confidentiality, and Privacy.

https://trykintsugi.com/

Severa

Privately Held

Founded 2004

Finland

Manage individual projects from sales to billing as well as your entire project portfolio. Visma Severa’s PSA software fits into your existing workflow to provide the information you need with integrated CRM, project management, resourcing, time tracking and invoicing. Industry standard compatibility with third-party systems and customization services are available.

http://www.severa.com/

Facturama

Privately Held

Founded 2012

Mexico

65 out of 100 new companies created in one year, disappear 2 years later due to mismanagement. So we created Facturama... Facturama is a website platform that provides support to individuals and SMEs to have a better control on their daily business through electronic invoicing management. *Mandatory since april 2014 by the Mexican IRS. We help... A. Not investing on an expensive electronic invoicing tool that exceeds the user needs;B. Reception, validation and storage of tax receipts;C. Single payslips production;D. Customer-accountant link and tax receipts delivery;E. Recover tax receipts from previous years;Our business model is FREEMIUM, 1 free schema and 2 annual payment schemas. Customer satisfaction is high, 85% of clients renewed their service after one year.

http://www.facturama.mx

Canopytax

Privately Held

Founded 2014

USA

Canopy is a cloud-based practice management and tax resolution software. The modern, easy-to-use software cuts out tax practice busywork, improves the client experience, and brings all the different tools a practitioner needs under one roof. Canopy is also known for its free 2-minute IRS Transcripts Tool. Canopy was founded by Kurt Avarell, who walked away from his career as a Wall Street tax attorney to launch Canopy from his basement in 2014.

https://www.canopytax.com/

Fusebill

Privately Held

Founded 2011

Canada

Fusebill (Twitter: @fusebill) automates invoicing, billing and collections for subscription based companies. Ideal for both B2B and B2C businesses, our customers span many industry sectors, including software as a service, digital media, and communications. Our customers rely on Fusebill to reduce their costs, speed their cash collections, and extend their customer lifecycles.

http://www.fusebill.com

Teamery

n/a

Founded date unknown

Unknown

For decades, the U$10bn global outplacement industry which serves the needs of redundant employees, has operated their businesses without enterprise-grade business management software. In identifying this opportunity, Teamery has achieved a first-mover advantage, producing the world’s first enterprise-grade ERP workflow product, customised for the outplacement industry. Developed over several years, the product offers businesses a single software platform on which to operate and manage their entire organisation. Encompassing a CRM module, workflow tracking systems, contractor timesheet management and invoicing modules, customer-facing portals and business intelligence reporting, Teamery delivers a tried-and-tested product to a fragmented market in need of business management software. Aligned to this global offering is the global footprint of the Teamery team with the founders based in Australia and the UK.

http://www.teamery.com

QOLOS

Privately Held

Founded 2018

USA

QOLOS gives small businesses the ability to operate their website like an enterprise-level company by integrating business operations with their website platform. Our MVP simplifies and automates billing for service-based companies. QOLOS allows the end-users (our customers’ customers) to make payments through a login panel on the public website; they can change profile information, view order history, update payment methods, and upgrade or cancel current subscriptions. Automated follow-ups help remind end users that payments are ready to be processed. This seamless integration of business operations and website management sets our customers up to move away from the paper-heavy and inefficient status quo (still common in service-based industries) and scale their business without an enterprise-level IT budget.

https://qolos.com/

LogiSense Corporation

Privately Held

Founded 1998

Canada

For today’s digital world, most billing systems don’t provide the freedom Service Providers need to deliver flexible billing options. Customers want pricing options tailored for the actual amount of services they use or specialized billing options other than what a simple flat rate billing system can provide.

http://www.logisense.com

TRY OUR SIMILAR COMPANIES APP

Find B2B Sales Prospects

Research Competitive Landscapes

Export Lists

Open Now

onBill

n/a

Founded 2014

Germany

With onBill you get organized faster and spend less time billing. No matter what device you use - desktop, laptop, tablet or smartphone - onBill is accessible anytime and wherever you are to create professional looking invoices, late payment reminders, offers or costs estimates and much more. Exclusively hosted in Germany - your data is always backed up and secure.

https://www.onbill.de/

m3ter

Privately Held

Founded 2020

United Kingdom

m3ter was founded to support software companies moving beyond simple recurring subscription models to implement hybrid and usage-based pricing (UBP). These models have grown in popularity thanks to the widespread adoption of Product Led Growth (PLG), as well as the rise of new software end-users created by the rise of APIs and automation. The ability to improve margin control, boost customer satisfaction and retention, and expand revenue through costless upselling has also made this emerging pricing strategy an invaluable lever for growth for modern software businesses.

https://www.m3ter.com/

Fawaterak

Privately Held

Founded 2018

Egypt

Fawaterk is an online invoicing platform for freelancers, micro and small businesses. The platform helps users add their customers, create and deliver tailored invoices, it simplifies the payment process for both parties. Moreover, users can also create online stores to their business through Fawaterk.

http://www.fawaterk.com

Finta

Privately Held

Founded date unknown

USA

Finta specializes in providing an all-in-one accounting application designed for startups. The app offers real-time financial metrics, bookkeeping, and tax services in a user-friendly interface. It simplifies financial management by translating complex accounting jargon into simple language, enabling founders to make strategic data-driven decisions. The platform aims to replace traditional bookkeeping and tax services with a seamless solution that preempts tax issues and provides necessary financial insights without the typical hassle.

https://www.finta.com/

Amberflo.io, Inc.

Privately Held

Founded 2020

USA

We provide an end-to-end usage data and consumption data infrastructure that serves as the system of record and single source of truth. Our platform is built from the ground up with design principles to deliver a high throughput, low latency managed service that is accurate, durable, scalable as you would expect from an enterprise-grade platform. Amberflo handles the collection, transformation, aggregation, visualization to dashboards, and persistence of all meter data included with the Metering Cloud.

https://www.amberflo.io/

MPP Global Solutions

Privately Held

Founded 2000

United Kingdom

MPP Global is a multinational corporation founded in 2000, that provides cloud-based identity management, customer relationship management and e-commerce solutions to the media and entertainment sectors to empower paid content strategies.

http://www.mppglobal.com

ForgeWorks

Closed Down (Assumed)

Founded date unknown

USA

ForgeWorks is a complete business management solution. The different aspects of a business (CRM, Invoicing / Billing, Accounting, Task Lists, Scheduling, etc...) are brought together into one beautiful, easy-to-use environment. Because this environment is modular by design, adding new functionality will never be a problem. ForgeWorks will replace multiple services, saving users time, money and frustration.

http://www.forgesoftware.com/

Abowire

Privately Held

Founded 2020

Germany

Abowire is a banking first all-in-one Subscription Management software for European businesses. We unify online with the offline subscriptions globally and reduce the complexity of running a scalable subscription business, by integrating all the tools you need in one solution. Designed to automate recurring billing, payments, banking, invoicing, taxes & much more. From revenue recognition and bank integration, to insightful analytics, we got you covered. No coding is required!

https://abowire.com
